heading.title: Planning, organization, and site follow-up without the friction

intro.paragraph: You own a piece of land and want to entrust project management to a qualified contractor? Les Constructions Dominic Cyr Inc. is here for you, whether for specific construction stages or a turnkey project.

advantages.heading: There are many advantages to entrusting us with the management of your project:
advantages.pricing: Depending on the scope and complexity of the project, pricing could be at a fixed cost or at a marked-up price. Contact us to discuss.

gallery.heading: Some project management achievements by Les Constructions Dominic Cyr Inc.
gallery.caption: Residence
